data.comment: The match is underway at Bravida Arena.
Sirius have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Daleho Irandust for Hacken drives towards goal at Bravida Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
In the minute 5, Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Stefano Vecchia for Sirius gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Hacken goal kick.
In the minute 7, Free kick Sirius.
Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gothenburg.
In the minute 10, Sirius advance rapidly upfield but Adam Ladeback blows for offside.
Hacken have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Sirius in Gothenburg.
In the minute 13, Sirius have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sirius at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 15, Adam Ladeback signals a Hacken throw-in in Sirius's half.
Adam Ladeback awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Sirius in their own half.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 19, Sirius to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
In the minute 21, Sirius are pushing forward but Stefano Vecchia's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Hacken in the half of Sirius.
Adam Ladeback awards Sirius a goal kick.
Adam Ladeback signals a Sirius throw-in in Hacken's half.
In the minute 25, In Gothenburg Sirius drive forward through Stefano Vecchia. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
In the minute 28, Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 32, Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Hacken.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
Adam Ladeback signals a throw-in for Sirius, close to Hacken's area.
In the minute 34, Sirius to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
Hacken have a goal kick.
Throw-in Hacken.
In the minute 36, Hacken's Ahmed Yasin is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Sirius drives forward and Yukiya Sugita gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 40, Adam Ladeback awards Sirius a goal kick.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sirius's Elias Andersson gets in a shot on goal at Bravida Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Sirius are in shooting range from this free kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gothenburg.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Bravida Arena.
The second-half is underway in Gothenburg.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Sirius.
In the minute 47, Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Free kick for Sirius in the half of Hacken.
In the minute 53, Elias Andersson of Sirius smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! Axel Bjornstrom gives Sirius a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 54, Great play from Yukiya Sugita to set up the goal.
Ahmed Yasin gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hacken.
Throw-in for Hacken close to the penalty box.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
In Gothenburg Sirius drive forward through Stefano Vecchia. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 58, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the away team in Gothenburg.
Ball safe as Hacken is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Gothenburg, Hacken push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 65, At Bravida Arena, Sirius are penalized for being offside.
Free kick Hacken.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 68, Ball safe as Hacken is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Henrik Rydstrom is making the team's first substitution at Bravida Arena with Johan Karlsson replacing Nahom Girmai.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
In the minute 70, Daleho Irandust of Hacken gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
In the minute 71, Adam Ladeback signals a Hacken throw-in in Sirius's half.
The home team replace Alexander Soderlund with Jasse Tuominen.
Hacken make their first substitution with Patrik Walemark replacing Ahmed Yasin.
In the minute 74, Free kick Hacken.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Godswill Ekpolo for Hacken has been booked by Adam Ladeback and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 76, Karl Larson is replacing Mohammed Saeid for Sirius at Bravida Arena.
Hacken are coming forward and Patrik Walemark gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Adam Ladeback awards Sirius a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Sirius.
Great shot from Sirius's Stefano Vecchia but he is denied by the crossbar.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Sirius.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Free kick for Sirius in the half of Hacken.
In the minute 82, Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gustav Berggren (Hacken) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 84, Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Hacken.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Andreas Alm (Hacken) is making a third substitution, with Alexander Faltsetas replacing Gustav Berggren.
In the minute 86, The away team have replaced Jamie Roche with Niklas Busch Thor. This is the third substitution made today by Henrik Rydstrom.
Henrik Rydstrom (Sirius) is making a fourth substitution, with Simon Gefvert replacing Yukiya Sugita.
Throw-in for Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 87, Hacken to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
Adam Ladeback signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Adam Ladeback awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 88, Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Hacken.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Johan Hammar is on a sub for Daleho Irandust for Hacken.
The home team have replaced Godswill Ekpolo with Viktor Lundberg. This is the fifth substitution made today by Andreas Alm.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Gothenburg.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Hacken have been awarded a penalty...
Alexander Faltsetas (Hacken) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Adam Ladeback.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
Tim Bjorkstrom (Sirius) has received a first yellow card.
Jasse Tuominen equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
